pullrequest.title: Link to tool for automatic mesh geometry computation and cleanup.

content.raw:
Awesome, thanks for the quick replies! I now get the SDF and the update button is working. Some other comments/suggestions:

* The closing `</inertia>` tag is missing the `/`
* The [construction_cone](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src/4b4490dc9e93/construction_cone/?at=default) mesh is scaled up 10 times when inserted into Gazebo. When I get the inertial properties, the volume is based on the original mesh though, so it ends up very small. You could consider adding an optional scale field so the user can adjust the volume.
* You could announce the tool on https://community.gazebosim.org/ so more people in the community are aware of your great tool :smile:
